name: MemeGalaxy
description:
You are in space and your main objective is to land your space shuttle to the landing zone. You'll encounter with obstacles which will wreck your ship, avoid them at all means possible.

Be strategic, plan your moves carefully and get your ship to land successfully to the "GREEN" landing zone.

All levels in this game were built to challenge the player. So, take your time and do whatever it take to prove me wrong by beating them.

The game contains pre-built in MEMES to judge your play experience.

Without further-ado, let's get flyin'

#LAUGH & FLY

*Pst: Please, if you like my hard work, consider donating any amount of cash, it helps me keep  going.
